gpt-4.name: Excellent
gpt-4.description: Translation performed using GPT-4, which provides higher accuracy but slower speed and higher cost.

gpt-3.5-turbo.name: Optimal
gpt-3.5-turbo.description: Translation performed using GPT-3, offering a balanced choice between price and quality.

gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.name: Economy
gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.description: Translation performed using GPT-3 without sending context, resulting in lower cost but lower translation quality. Some sentences may require manual correction.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: The delay between each translation. This is used to prevent the API from being overloaded. The default value is 5 second.

key.name: API Key
key.description: You can obtain API keys at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys. Adding multiple keys can enhance translation speed.

host.name: API Host
host.description: This is typically used to bypass firewall blocking. If this application is functioning properly, there is no need to modify this setting.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.name: Edit prompt
prompt.description: The prompt used with ChatGPT. You can modify the prompt here. Additionally, {{lang}} is used to specify the language, and {{additional}} is used for additional notes. These fields will be automatically filled in during translation. When modifying the prompt, please make sure to keep these fields intact.

multi-language.name: Bilingual Subtitles
multi-language.description: Please select whether to save the original text and the translated text simultaneously.

reset.title: Reset
reset.name: Reset all settings
reset.prompt: This will clear all settings and restore all settings to their default values. Are you sure you want to reset?

about.title: About
about.author: Developer
about.buy_me_a_coffee_description: If this project has been helpful to you, please consider buying me a cup of coffee. It will motivate me to continue the development further.

translate.target_description: English, 繁體中文, 日本語, etc.
translate.additional_placeholder: e.g. This is a Star Wars movie.
translate.file_description: Drag and drop the subtitle file or click here to choose a file.
translate.no_api_key: Please enter your API key in the settings.
